ddl.statement: CREATE TABLE mlcm (id INT PRIMARY KEY, mlcm_name VARCHAR(100))
CREATE TABLE hrym (order_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, amount DECIMAL)
CREATE TABLE idmg (order_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, amount DECIMAL)

queries.query: SELECT u.id, u.name, COUNT(o.order_id) FROM idmg u JOIN hrym o ON u.id = o.user_id GROUP BY u.id
SELECT u.id, u.name, COUNT(o.order_id) FROM mlcm u JOIN idmg o ON u.id = o.user_id GROUP BY u.id
WITH active_hrym AS (SELECT id FROM hrym WHERE active = true) SELECT * FROM idmg WHERE user_id IN (SELECT id FROM active_hrym)
WITH active_hrym AS (SELECT id FROM hrym WHERE active = true) SELECT * FROM mlcm WHERE user_id IN (SELECT id FROM active_hrym)
WITH active_mlcm AS (SELECT id FROM mlcm WHERE active = true) SELECT * FROM hrym WHERE user_id IN (SELECT id FROM active_mlcm)
SELECT u.id, u.name, COUNT(o.order_id) FROM idmg u JOIN hrym o ON u.id = o.user_id GROUP BY u.id
WITH active_hrym AS (SELECT id FROM hrym WHERE active = true) SELECT * FROM idmg WHERE user_id IN (SELECT id FROM active_hrym)
WITH active_hrym AS (SELECT id FROM hrym WHERE active = true) SELECT * FROM idmg WHERE user_id IN (SELECT id FROM active_hrym)
